trans-unit.source: 0.1 - Unreleased
trans-unit.target: 0,1-Niewydany
5.1-(Recuperado em 2012-10-08)

trans-unit.source: EEA Depiction (formerly valentine.imagescales) is a generic system for creating thumbnails/image representations for content types, both those provided by Plone, and custom ones.
trans-unit.target: EEA Depiction（以前称为Valentine.imagescales）是一个通用系统，用于为内容类型（由Plone提供的和自定义的内容类型）创建缩略图/图像表示。

trans-unit.source: EEA Depiction has the following dependencies:
trans-unit.target: EEA描述具有以下依赖性：

trans-unit.source: EEA - European Environment Agency (EU)
trans-unit.target: EEA-欧洲环境署（EU）

trans-unit.source: atctListAlbum.py - which is responsible for displaying items in atct_album_view.pt
trans-unit.target: atctListAlbum.py-负责在atct_album_view.pt中显示项目

trans-unit.source: thumbnail_view.pt - which is the browser template responsible for thumbnail listing for the plone.app.collection package
trans-unit.target: thumbnail_view.pt-这是浏览器模板，负责plone.app.collection包的缩略图列表

trans-unit.source: Add
trans-unit.target: 添加

trans-unit.source: As of eea.depiction 5.2 we customize the following resources in order to display any items in thumbnail listings:
trans-unit.target: 从eea.depiction 5.2开始，我们自定义以下资源，以显示缩略图列表中的所有项目：

trans-unit.source: At the moment this system is implemented and tested only on Archetypes content types, however this system could be adapted in a later version to work also for dexterity content types.
trans-unit.target: 目前这个系统只在Archetypes内容类型上实现和测试,但是这个系统可以在以后的版本中进行调整,使其也适用于dexterity内容类型。

trans-unit.source: Bug Fix: Changed the way in which the DexterityImageView retrieves images [iulianpetchesi #87511]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。改变了DexterityImageView检索图像的方式 [iulianpetchesi #87511]。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Treated get_size error when the blob is represented as a string [zoltan_andras refs #86449]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正。当blob表示为字符串时,处理get_size错误[zoltan_andras refs #86449]。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Use try/except in display method to avoid errors when blobs are missing [tiberich]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。在显示方法中使用try/except来避免在缺少blobs时出错 [tiberich]

trans-unit.target: 错误修正:为Topic添加了类型配置文件,修正了Plone 4.2中的测试[tiberich #5346]。

trans-unit.target: 错误修正:增加了为默认图片缩略图大小注册的视图;允许plone过滤器从html文本链接中正确检索图片[tiberich #4651]。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: tests fixes, failling tests in other products
trans-unit.target: 错误修复:测试修复,在其他产品中测试失败。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: use a NamedBlobImage when adding initial image. This fixes issues with Plone websites that have replaced the default Archetypes-based content types with those derived from Dexterity. In case you have such a website, you should delete the “/portal_depiction/generic” image and reimport the EEA Depiction - Import Various generic setup step. [tiberich #92045]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：添加初始图像时使用NamedBlobImage。这解决了Plone网站的问题，该网站已将默认的基于原型的内容类型替换为从Dexterity派生的内容类型。如果您有这样的网站，则应删除“ / portal_depiction / generic”图像，然后重新导入EEA Depiction-导入各种常规设置步骤。[提比里希＃92045]

trans-unit.source: Change: Added @@recreate-scales browser-view utility [avoinea refs #109515]
trans-unit.target: Zmiana:Added @@recreate-scales browser-view utility [avoinea refs #109515]

trans-unit.source: Change: Added more custom image scales: panoramic, print, landscape, portrait, wide, xlarge [avoinea refs #109515]
trans-unit.target: Zmiana:Dodano bardziej niestandardowe skale obrazu:panoramiczna,drukowana,krajobrazowa,portretowa,szeroka,xlarge [avoinea refs #109515]

trans-unit.source: Change: Added some unit tests for rdf marshaller [zoltan_andras refs #86696]
trans-unit.target: 更改。为rdf marshaller添加了一些单元测试[zoltan_andras refs #86696]。

trans-unit.source: Change: Auto-include zcml within plone context in order to make this package work without having to add it within buildout zcml directive. [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 更改。在plone上下文中自动包含zcml,以使这个包能够正常工作,而不需要在buildout zcml指令中添加它。[avoinea]

trans-unit.source: Change: Changed fetch url for jenkins build install script to the install script from the main EEA CPB repository [olimpiurob refs #22402]
trans-unit.target: 更改。将jenkins构建安装脚本的URL地址改为从EEA CPB主仓库中获取安装脚本[OLIMpiurob refs #22402]。

trans-unit.source: Change: Enabled compatibility with eea.rdfmarshaller [zoleesan - refs #83153]
trans-unit.target: 更改。启用与eea.rdfmarshaller的兼容性[zoleesan-refs #83153]

trans-unit.source: Change: Refactoring valentine.imagescales to eea.depiction [voineali refs #5497]
trans-unit.target: 更改。将valentine.imagescales重构为eea.depiction[voineali refs #5497]

trans-unit.source: Change: Remove Sphinx generated documentation [petchesi-iulian refs #88212]
trans-unit.target: 更改。删除Sphinx生成的文件[petchesi-iulian refs #88212]

trans-unit.source: Change: Replace eeacms/zptlint with eeacms/plone-test:4 zptlint [avoinea refs #90415]
trans-unit.target: 更改。将eeacms/zptlint改为eeacms/plone-test:4 zptlint [avoinea refs #90415]

trans-unit.source: Change: Restructured package to work with plone.app.imaging instead of overriding it [tiberich #4284]
trans-unit.target: 更改。重组包,使其与plone.app.imaging配合使用,而不是覆盖它 [tiberich #4284]。

trans-unit.source: Change: Switched to curl in the jenkins build install script [olimpiurob refs #22402]
trans-unit.target: 更改。在jenkins构建安装脚本中改用curl [olimpiurob refs #22402]。

trans-unit.source: Change: Using atct_album_view as the default view for portal_depiction [voineali refs #5497]
trans-unit.target: 改动:将atct_album_view作为portal_depiction的默认视图。使用atct_album_view作为portal_depiction的默认视图[voineali refs #5497]

trans-unit.source: Change: added ICountryProfile to DepictionVocabulary interfaces [ichim-david refs #88123]
trans-unit.target: 更改:在DepictionVocabulary接口中添加了ICountryProfile [ichim-david refs #88123]。

trans-unit.source: Change: fixed PyLint warnings and errors [eduard-fironda refs #84949]
trans-unit.target: 更改:修正了PyLint的警告和错误[eduard-fironda refs #84949]。

trans-unit.source: Change: return the whole image when it’s not possible to return a scale in imgview for folders and fields [tiberich #4374]
trans-unit.target: 更改：在imgview中无法为文件夹和字段返回比例时，返回整个图像[tiberich＃4374]

trans-unit.source: Change: thumbnail_view now uses image_mini size as a background image instead of an image tag [ichim-david refs #106884]
trans-unit.target: Zmiana:miniaturka_view używa teraz rozmiaru image_mini jako obrazu tła zamiast znacznika obrazu [ichim-david refs #106884]

trans-unit.source: Change: updated URLs pointing to eea.europa.eu with https:// [alecghica refs #95849]
trans-unit.target: 更改：使用https：// [alecghica refs＃95849]更新了指向eea.europa.eu的URL。

trans-unit.target: 变动:更新了软件包信息[eduard-fironda]

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Cleanup: Removed empty skin folder
trans-unit.target: 清理。删除了空的皮肤文件夹

trans-unit.source: Cleanup: Simplified design, removed ImageLink and ImageTag. [pthulin]
trans-unit.target: 清理。简化设计,删除了ImageLink和ImageTag。[pthulin]

trans-unit.target: 内容

trans-unit.target: 依赖性

trans-unit.source: EEA Depiction (formerly valentine.imagescales)
trans-unit.target: 欧洲经济区描绘(原valentine.imagescales)

trans-unit.source: Feature: Add black borders to 4:3 images scaled to 16:9, and don’t stretch the play button. [pthulin]
trans-unit.target: 功能：将黑色边框添加到比例为16：9的4：3图像，并且不要拉伸播放按钮。[ththulin]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added JPEG to known formats for thumbnails [voineali #3847]
trans-unit.target: 特点:在已知的缩略图格式中增加了JPEG格式。将JPEG添加到已知的缩略图格式中 [voineali #3847]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added possibility to provide custom IRecreateScales adapter for custom content-type. [avoinea refs #109515]
trans-unit.target: Cecha charakterystyczna:Dodano możliwość dostarczenia niestandardowego adaptera IRecreateScales dla niestandardowych treści.[avoinea refs #109515]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added upgrade steps [voineali #4392]
trans-unit.target: 特点。新增升级步骤 [voineali #4392]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added utilities IDepictionTool and IDepictionVocabulary [voineali refs #5497]
trans-unit.target: 特点:增加了IDepictionTool和IDepictionVocabulary两个实用工具。增加了IDepictionTool和IDepictionVocabulary实用程序[voineali refs #5497]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Enabled folder.ImageView for ATTopics. [pthulin]
trans-unit.target: 功能。为ATTopics启用文件夹.ImageView。[pthulin]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Made p4a.video dependency optional [voineali refs #5497]
trans-unit.target: 功能:将p4a.video依赖性改为可选[voineali refs #5497]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Plone 4.x compatible release [tiberich #4284]
trans-unit.target: 特征。Plone 4.x兼容版本 [tiberich #4284]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Thumbnails are always in formats PNG, JPG or GIF even if original is something else i.e TIFF
trans-unit.target: 特点。缩略图总是以PNG,JPG或GIF格式存在,即使原图是其他格式,如TIFF。

trans-unit.source: Feature: Updated PIL dependency with Pillow [voineali]
trans-unit.target: 功能:更新了PIL与Pillow的依赖关系[voineali]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Use fallback images to ensure that an image is always returned. [pthulin]
trans-unit.target: 特点。使用后备图像来确保图像总是被返回。[pthulin]

trans-unit.source: Feature: added a interface mapping fallback for our simile exhibit daviz product. [demarant]
trans-unit.target: 特点:为我们的比喻展览daviz产品增加了一个接口映射回退。[demarant]

trans-unit.source: Feature: added ability to provide a fallback image for a specific scale name for example if we want to have a different fallback image for the large scale of a Document we can add an image with the id document-large and for image_large this image will be used instead of the Document fallback image or any given generic image if no image is added for Document in general. Through acquisition you can also override the served image if you add an image with id document-large within a parent container. [ichim-david refs #111968]
trans-unit.target: 功能：增加了为特定比例名称提供后备图像的功能，例如，如果我们想为大型文档提供不同的后备图像，则可以添加id为document-large的图像，对于image_large，此图像将为如果通常没有为文档添加任何图像，则用它代替文档后备图像或任何给定的通用图像。如果您在父容器中添加id为document-large的图像，则通过获取您还可以覆盖投放的图像。[ichim-david Refs＃111968]

trans-unit.source: Feature: added information for contributors [ciobabog refs #13892]
trans-unit.target: 特点:为贡献者添加信息[ciobabog refs #13892]

trans-unit.source: Feature: adding Sphinx-generated documentation in Page Template format [batradav refs #9502]
trans-unit.target: 功能:在页面模板格式中添加Sphinx生成的文档[batradav refs #9502]。

trans-unit.source: Feature: customized atctListAlbum to display all items when using atct_album_view [ichimdav #5601]
trans-unit.target: 功能:自定义atctListAlbum在使用atct_album_view时显示所有项目[ichimdav #5601]。

trans-unit.source: Feature: customized thumbnail_view for plone.app.collection in order to display all items since they have fallback images [ichimdav #5601]
trans-unit.target: 功能:为plone.app.collection定制缩略图视图,以便显示所有项目,因为它们有后备图片[ichimdav #5601]。

trans-unit.source: Funding and project management
trans-unit.target: 筹资和项目管理

trans-unit.source: How to specify fallback preview images
trans-unit.target: 如何指定后备预览图像

trans-unit.source: If the imgview crashes, isn’t found or can not locate/generate an image, we continue by checking if there’s an image specified for any of the contexts interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 如果imgview崩溃，找不到或无法定位/生成图像，我们将继续检查是否为任何上下文接口指定了图像。

trans-unit.source: If there’s no fallback image, we look for an image for the context portal type, e.g. article, news-item, document. This should be placed in the ‘portal_depiction’ utility (Site Setup > Depiction Library)
trans-unit.target: 如果没有后备图像，我们将为上下文门户类型（例如，文章，新闻项，文档）寻找图像。应将其放置在“ portal_depiction”实用程序中（“站点设置”>“描述库”）

trans-unit.source: If you are using zc.buildout and the plone.recipe.zope2instance recipe to manage your project, you can do this:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用zc.buildout和plone.recipe.zope2instance 配方来管理项目，则可以执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: ImageLink that returns the HTML link to the image.
trans-unit.target: ImageLink,返回图片的HTML链接。

trans-unit.source: ImageTag that returns the HTML tag for the image
trans-unit.target: ImageTag,返回图片的HTML标签。

trans-unit.source: ImageView that retrieves an image in the desired scale.
trans-unit.target: 以所需比例检索图像的ImageView。

trans-unit.source: To make it work for a content type, three adapters need to be provided:
trans-unit.target: 要使其适用于某一内容类型,需要提供三个适配器。

trans-unit.source: To map a fallback image to a portal type, place it in this folder and name it after the portal type.
trans-unit.target: Aby zmapować obraz awaryjny na typ portalu,umieść go w tym folderze i nazwij go po typie portalu.

trans-unit.source: To map a fallback image to an interface just add a named-utility for IDepictionVocabulary (see eea.depiction.vocabularies)
trans-unit.target: Aby zmapować obraz awaryjny do interfejsu,wystarczy dodać narzędzie o nazwie IDepictionVocabulary (patrz eea.depiction.vocabularies).

trans-unit.target: 更新你的 buildout.cfg 文件。

trans-unit.source: Upgrade notes
trans-unit.target: 升级说明

trans-unit.source: Upgrade step: Within “Plone > Site setup > Add-ons” click on upgrade button available for eea.depiction [ichimdav #5601]
trans-unit.target: 升级步骤：在“克隆>网站设置>加载项”中，单击可用于eea.depiction的升级按钮[ichimdav＃5601]

trans-unit.source: Upgrade step: Within “Plone > Site setup > Add-ons” click on upgrade button available for eea.depiction or install ‘EEA Depiction’ if it’s not already installed.
